title: [GAMEPLAY] Spirit Guard Udyr is Broken
body:
Welp Riot still didnt fix this in this patch
To Reproduce
1. Start game with spirit guard udyr skin
2. Activate a stance other then bear
3. Do something to activate a quote (Walking, Attacking, Joke, or Taunt) Only bear stance quotes will play
This is a VERY annoying bug because this is a beary (Get it?) expensive skin and i hope it can be fixed next patch

replies.body: This is a known issue, and we're working to resolve it! Thanks for the report!
glad to see its not just me
